Package ie.dcu.cngl.tokenizer

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IParagrapher
    Provides interface for separating content at paragraph level
    ISentenizer
    Provides interface for separating content at sentence level
    IStructurer
    Provides interface for structuring content at token, sentence and paragraph level
    ITokenizer
    Provides interface for tokenizing content
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    PageStructure
    Encapsulates the 3-dimensional structure of a page.
    Paragrapher
    Separates the tokenized content into paragraphs.
    SectionInfo
    Holds content value and location.
    Sentenizer
    Separates the tokenized content into sentences.
    Structurer
    A Structurer uses a Paragrapher and Sentenizer to provide 3-dimensional content structure.
    TokenInfo
    Holds derived during tokenization.
    Tokenizer
    Breaks content into basic units.
    TokenizerUtils
    Static class containing shared variables and methods.
    UnitInfo
    Basic unit info.
